The Weeknd was surrounded by hundreds of masked dancers during his sensational COVID-friendly Super Bowl LV halftime show in Tampa Florida on Sunday.

articles.title: Win Foo Fighters' favourite records on vinyl - NME
articles.description: Foo Fighters are offering you the chance to win their favourite albums from Blur, Fleetwood Mac, Queen, David Bowie, Alice Cooper and The Police
articles.content:
To celebrate the release of their new album ‘Medicine At Midnight‘, Foo Fighters are giving you the chance to win their favourite records on vinyl.
